category.name: Change Management
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CM_notehistory_extra_columns
preference.preference_description: Determines which fields of the BOM change form are included in the Note Change History dialog box. This dialog box is opened from the Structure Manager application and tracks note changes for a particular component of an assembly. Valid Values: Accepts multiple strings as values; each string must contain a persistent property of the BOM change form, using the following syntax: CM_notehistory_extra_columns= Form-Field1 Form-Field2
